name: deckster
description: An open-source JavaScript library for creating card games.
author: Kristóf Poduszló <kripod@protonmail.com>

scripts.compile: rimraf bin && mkdir bin && cd bin && browserify ./../lib -t babelify -d | exorcist deckster.js.map > deckster.js && uglifyjs deckster.js -o deckster.min.js --in-source-map deckster.js.map --source-map deckster.js.min.map
